primary.description: Main actions that drive user toward key goals
primary.usage: Use sparingly, only for most important actions

secondary.description: Supporting actions that provide additional options

destructive.description: Actions that delete, remove, or permanently change data

affirmative.usage: For confirmations, agreements, and positive actions

negative.usage: For canceling, dismissing, or rejecting actions

helper_text.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long
helper_text.email_format: We'll use this to send you important updates
helper_text.phone_format: Include country code if outside the US

validation_messages.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation_messages.password_weak: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation_messages.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.message: We're experiencing a temporary issue. Please try again in a moment.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

permission.title: Access Denied
permission.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

validation.title: Please Check Your Information
validation.message: Some fields need your attention before we can continue.

form_submitted.title: Message Sent Successfully
form_submitted.message: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

account_created.title: Welcome to MaterialLab
account_created.message: Your account has been created successfully. Check your email to verify your account.

profile_updated.title: Profile Updated
profile_updated.message: Your changes have been saved successfully.

no_projects.title: No Projects Yet
no_projects.message: Create your first AI project to get started with MaterialLab.

no_results.title: No Results Found
no_results.message: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters.

no_notifications.title: All Caught Up
no_notifications.message: You don't have any new notifications.

warning.session_expiring: Your session will expire in 5 minutes

contractions.description: Use contractions to sound more natural and conversational

avoid: Your data is analyzed by AI
Your request is processed by our system

screen_reader.form_instructions: Use tab to navigate between fields and enter to submit
screen_reader.table_instructions: Use arrow keys to navigate table cells
screen_reader.modal_instructions: Press escape to close this dialog
